column5: I heard a rumor that the rules were changing. I know last year it was only crawlers, and they could not be in dirt. Anybody know what it is this year for sure? Thanks, Fritz
I would bet it is still the same. Night Crawlers only in commercial bedding...been that way for years... Steve

Don't tell Beano and Roy, but I have always taken crawlers across the border and they have always had to be packed in buss bedding (no soil). If anything has changed with that I need to know, too. NEPiker
